entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Rankin Inlet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:36 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -39.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rankin Inlet Airport 09:52 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
Condition: Blowing Snow
Temperature: -39.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -59
Dewpoint: -43.5°C
Wind: NNW 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 36.
entry.summary: Sunny. Blowing snow at times. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 36. Wind chill minus 60 this morning and minus 53 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 34 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Blowing snow at times. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 34 this evening then falling. Wind chill near minus 53. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 38 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing early in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 38 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 52. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
